sentence: Your tasks
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks

sentence: In this role, you will be responsible for advising the Group's international Executives in the area of our Business Stream Products with regard to all HR relevant topics, projects and measures.
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks

sentence: You will derive measures for the successful implementation and achievement of HR objectives from the Group strategy and review their implementation and achievement (KPIs).
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks

sentence: You actively shape the remuneration policy of the individual divisions and companies and advise managers on remuneration systems and models.
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks

sentence: In addition you support strategic HR planning, derive resulting measures and monitor their implementation.
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks

sentence: You manage global HR projects and shape their content based on your specialist know how and in accordance with the Group strategy.
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks

sentence: You will also initiate, support and manage international change projects and ensure their successful implementation in accordance with the global change management framework.
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks

sentence: You ensure the exchange of best practices within the HR community to support continuous process improvement and harmonization.
jobTitle: Global Senior Human Resources Manager f m d
label: tasks
